body.p:
Covington Ky
Jany 8' 1862.
His Excllcy -- B. Magoffin.
Dr Sir --
Mr. Columbus C. Scales of this County desires the appointment of Notary Public for Kenton County.
I know him to be a worthy young man of temperate and business habits -- He is now a student of law.
Will you be kind enough to confer the appointment upon him --

Jefferson Kenton Co
Notary
C. C. Scales
Comd. Issd Jany 9. 1862
